sections.TOP: Lord of Bear Island05257iwznwi5xnjzmwmlxvee72n2vy58jlxb1491982014-06-26T20:19:26ZCorneliusAgrippa5753603'''Lord of Bear Island''' is a title held by the ruler of the [[Bear Island]] in [[the North]]. The role is traditionally held by the head of [[House Mormont]], a vassal of [[House Stark]]. The current Lady of Bear Island is [[Maege Mormont]].
